arabic.title: Hashrab hashish (هشرب حشيش)
text: ستي قالتلي البنات بيلبسوا فساتين
امي قالتلي البنات ما يلعبوش ف الطين
و خالتي التي ترتدي الخمار قالتلي غني براحتك بس هتروحي النار
بس انا ابويا ماقليش .. فانا هعمل الصح وهشرب حشيش
عالم ما فيش ف دماغها غير الجواز والنيش
سيني ذهب وملايات وستاير كرانيش
اوعي مرة تباتي برة أوتتأخري مرة
وعندها البواب يشوفك وما تتزوجيش

english.title: i'll get high
text: my grandmother told me: girls wear dresses
and my mother told me: girls can't play on the mud
and my religious aunt told me: suit yourself and sing but you will go to hell
but my father didn't say!...so i'll do the right thing and i'll get high
people has nothing in thier mind but marrige and niche
and all fancy and gloming stuff
"you can't sleepover or come home late
or the gatekeeper will see you and then no one will marry you"

english.title: Will smoke hashish
text: My grandma told me that girls wear dresses.
My mother told me that girls don’t play in the mud.
And my aunt, who wears the khImar, told me: "sing as you wish, but you're going to the fire".
But my father said nothing .. so I'll do the right thing and smoke some hashish
All they think about is marriage and beautiful things
Bed sheets, gold and decorated curtains.
Don’t ever stay a night out or stay out late.
Don’t let the door man see you, because nobody will want to marry you.
